original_text: The night has nearly finished and the day is almost here. So we must stop doing the bad things that belong to the dark. Instead, we must take weapons like soldiers who are ready to fight in the light.
korean_text: 밤이 깊고 낮이 가까웠으니 그러므로 우리가 어둠의 일을 벗고 빛의 갑옷을 입자

sentences.original_text: and the day is almost here
So we must stop doing the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 나쁜 일들을 멈추어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, we must take weapons like soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에 우리는 군인들처럼 무기를 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: who are ready to fight in the light
